name: InterestingHistoryFacts
0:
”Alexa open Interesting History Facts”
”Alexa ask Interesting History Facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell Interesting History Facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: interesting history facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill provides a vast array of interesting facts about history that will brighten your day, so you can flex with your friends whenever they give you the opportunity!

To start, just say "Alexa, open History Facts" or "Alexa, open Interesting History Facts" to get one of the many updated history facts".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
